name: Bomb Cart
description:
Made with the theme balance in mind for the ScoreSpace#8 game jam.

WASD and arrow keys will move and rotate the cart so that the player can keep the bomb from falling to the ground!  I personally recommend using left and right arrow keys for movement and A, D for tilting the cart. Space will make the bomb jump; this is quite useful...

Unity, Affinity Designer and Garage Band are useful software.
